The sub-fund aims to do this with a higher ESG rating, as provided by established third party sources subject to additional HSBC proprietary analysis, calculated as a market cap weighted average of the ESG ratings given to the issuers of the sub-fund’s investments, than the weighted average of the investable infrastructure equity universe.
